name: Build Website
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    name: Build and Push
    steps:
      - name: git-checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup NodeJs
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: "21"

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm install

      - name: Build Project
        run: npm run build

      - name: Push
        uses: s0/git-publish-subdir-action@develop
        env:
          REPO: self
          BRANCH: production
          FOLDER: dist
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          MESSAGE: "Build: ({sha}) {msg}"
